uvi.description:
usb: dwc3: ep0: fix NULL pointer exception

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.4.273 by commit 96b74a99d360235c24052f1d060e64ac53f43528. For more details please see the references link.
